home.title: Fernandez Juan
home.paragraph: Seeking new <0>professional opportunities</0> with <1>challenging</1> projects that promote my <2>professional growth</2>. I'm interested in joining <3>teams</3> where I can <4>apply</4> and <5>enhance</5> my skills as a developer.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: My name is Juan Manuel Fernández, and I’m a full stack developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I’m currently in my final year of the Programming Technician program at the National Technological University.
about.skillsIntro: I’m looking for new opportunities that will allow me to continue growing professionally. My favorite programming languages are Python, C#, and JavaScript.
about.experience: I currently have a B2 level in English and I’m constantly improving. I work as an independent developer, gathering requirements and designing solutions with systems that are intuitive and easy for users to use.
